resources.string: As the Avengers and their allies have continued to protect the world from threats too large for any one hero to handle, a new danger has emerged from the cosmic shadows: Thanos. A despot of intergalactic infamy, his goal is to collect all six Infinity Stones, artifacts of unimaginable power, and use them to inflict his twisted will on all of reality. Everything the Avengers have fought for has led up to this moment - the fate of Earth and existence itself has never been more uncertain.

Official Sites: Marvel
Country: USA
Language: English
Release Date: 26 April 2018 (Israel)
Also Known As: Ha'nokmim: Milkhemet ha'einsof
Filming Locations: Pinewood Atlanta Studios, 461 Sandy Creek Road, Fayetteville, Georgia, USA

Budget:$321,000,000 (estimated)
Opening Weekend USA: $257,698,183, 29 April 2018, Wide Release
Gross USA: $678,815,482
Cumulative Worldwide Gross: $2,046,664,003

Runtime: 149 min
Sound Mix: IMAX 6-Track | Dolby Surround 7.1 | 12-Track Digital Sound (IMAX 12 track)| Dolby Digital | Dolby Atmos | Sonics-DDP | DTS (DTS: X)| Auro 11.1
Color: Color (ACES)
Aspect Ratio: 2.39 : 1
